modName: Tales of the wolf - Infect your companion
descriptionHtml:
Do you want a werewolf as a follower? Then this is the perfect mod!

Features:

The mod is scripted to be compatible with the widest variety of other Werewolf mods.
Any NPC follower can now gain the Werewolf Curse via the 'Infect with Lycanthropy' dialogue option (even the ones added by custom mods).
Any NPC follower can be cured from the Werewolf Curse via the 'Cure from Lycanthropy' dialogue option.
Followers infected with the Werewolf Curse can (toggle) activate their Beast Form via dialogue.
This mod is only compatible with the original races!

Recommended mods:

To get the mod to work even better make sure you download this mods! and this mod works perfectly without this mods!

Curse of the Werewolf Mod by Fennica - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11028
New Scary Werewolf SHOUT by Darkside - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=7769
Sounds of Skyrim - The Wilds by Cliffworms - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10886

Know issues:

NPC followers using a custom race will just bug it! so don't infect it!!!

Races that are supported at the moment:
High Elves, Argonians, Wood Elves, Bretons, Dark Elves, Imperials, Khajiits, Nords, Orcs and Redguards.
author: DrmZmodZ
